members.signatureBeforeChange: void setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, int flags)
members.signatureAfterChange: void setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, int flags)
diff: -	* Feature on WinCE.  The SWP_DRAWFRAME flag for SetWindowPos()
-	* causes a WM_SIZE message to be sent even when the SWP_NOSIZE
-	* flag is specified.  The fix is to clear SWP_DRAWFRAME.

members.signatureBeforeChange: public void setLocation (int x, int y)
